Trafikito Help
Help Widgets Price
Dashboard

Can I get an invoice for a company?
Yes, you can. Just ensure that the billing profile is filled out with the company details.

Can I get a refund?
No. We do not facilitate refunds because we offer the option of using Trafikito for free for any period of time. So you should only buy a paid plan only when you are sure you need it.

Can I edit a paid invoice?
No. Paid invoices are in view only mode and can not be edited or removed.

Can I be a member of several workspaces at once?
Yes, you can. You can join several workspaces at once.

Can a workspace have several owners & admins?
Workspaces can have only one owner at any given time but may have one or more admins.

Trafikito Goal

The main goal is to make a stable tool which provides information in a new way for free, for everyone and with smart defaults yet powerful configurable options.
